version = 1.6.5

一个Python的常用工具类库，主要用于股票预测等功能，同时提供各类优化算法的调用工具。
联系方式：540673597@qq.com

安装：
pip install yangke-1.6.5-py3-none-any.whl

测试安装是否成功：
import yangke
yangke.info()
 module 'yangke' installed successfully 
 version is 1.6.8 
The optional submodules are: [Database], [Stock], [ImageRecognition], [GameServer], [Performance]
Use command pip install yangke[Database]/pip install *.whl[Database] to install the selected submodule.
pip install *.whl[All][Database] to install all the submodule.
